questions.question: ................................. you are caught cheating on the exam, you will be disqualified.
questions.description: If expresses a condition - something which must happen first so that something else can happen.

questions.question: ....................................... you stop gambling, you will land in trouble.
questions.description: Unless is similar to if not.

questions.question: ...................................... she invited me, I would go.
questions.description: If expresses a condition - something which must happen first so that something else can happen.

questions.question: ......................................... he apologizes, we will not take any further action against him.
questions.description: If expresses a condition - something which must happen first so that something else can happen.

questions.question: ....................................... you knew the answer, why didn't you tell me?
questions.description: If expresses a condition - something which must happen first so that something else can happen.

questions.question: I won't be able to finish this job, ...................................... you help me.
questions.description: Unless is similar to if not.

questions.question: Children cannot enter the park .......................................... they are accompanied by adults.
questions.description: Unless is similar to if not.

questions.question: You can't go home .................................... you finish the job.
questions.description: Unless is similar to if not.

questions.question: ..................................... you leave my house, I will call the police.
questions.description: Unless is similar to if not.

questions.question: .................................... you pass the test, you will get the job.
questions.description: If expresses a condition - something which must happen first so that something else can happen.

questions.question: ......................................... you clear this hurdle, you can't land the job.
questions.description: Unless is similar to if not.

questions.question: ......................................... you mend your ways, you will be in trouble.
questions.description: Unless is similar to if not.
